3a803c28-82d3-4da7-8f2c-b8b326a3a8ec.name: npmInstall.sh
3a803c28-82d3-4da7-8f2c-b8b326a3a8ec.description:
Will npm install a supplied package only if not already found in node_modules .
Login account must have sudo access.
Use -g to install globally.
Usage: npmInstall packagename [-g]
3a803c28-82d3-4da7-8f2c-b8b326a3a8ec.script:
rm -f <%a.utilsPath%>/npmInstall.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.utilsPath%>/npmInstall.sh

while [ ! -f <%p.utilsPath%>/npmInstall.sh ]
setPromptCodes:3e 20
   do
   sleep 0.1
done
setPrompt:[SysStack]

chmod 770 <%a.utilsPath%>/npmInstall.sh
echo var:npmInstall:npmInstall.sh
3a803c28-82d3-4da7-8f2c-b8b326a3a8ec.template:
#!/bin/bash
return_=0
# set to 0 if found
ls node_modules | grep $1 >/dev/null 2>&1 && { return_=1; }
ls /usr/lib/node_modules | grep $1 >/dev/null 2>&1 && { return_=1; }
  if [ "$return_" -eq 1 ]; then
    echo Found
  else
    echo Not found
    sudo npm install $1 $2 --save
  fi

4c51478e-1bcc-4f46-a51b-e18ac20d9ddc.template:
#!/bin/sh

file=$1

if [ ! -e "$file" ] ; then
    touch "$file"
    echo $2 >> $file
fi

if [ ! -w "$file" ] ; then
    echo cannot write to $file
    exit 1
fi

424840d3-0ff1-45ec-9c89-74eb72da48b4.description:
Provides a simple service to get jason data from a data store.
Returns a row or all rows. 
Call service with 'id=#' to get all rows. Call with 'id=[id]' to get a specific row.
Eg: 
http://myNode/ezGet&id=#
   This will return all rows
http://myNode/ezGet&id=123
  This will return only row where id=123

bb7b3601-f644-47c3-87ff-08a2ae3df47d.name: re/start node
bb7b3601-f644-47c3-87ff-08a2ae3df47d.description:
Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh
bb7b3601-f644-47c3-87ff-08a2ae3df47d.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

22308eef-4509-47e3-867a-9b1b72e9dfe6.name: Sample Applications
22308eef-4509-47e3-867a-9b1b72e9dfe6.description:
Builds and deploys sample applications.
Creates Project Folders.
22308eef-4509-47e3-867a-9b1b72e9dfe6.script:
cd ~
pwd
export projectName=<%c.projectName%> 

sudo rm -fr projects/$projectName/
mkdir ./projects/
mkdir projects/$projectName/
cd ./projects/$projectName/

export:projectPath:pwd

echo var:projectName:$projectName

echo var:testingHostPort:<%c.testingProt%><%s.host%>:<%c.testingPort%> 

echo var:systemUser:<%c.user%>

8c5c3beb-a380-4fdb-b183-8256da61ac4a.name: Node instance (Apps.js)
8c5c3beb-a380-4fdb-b183-8256da61ac4a.script:

<%s.waitFor%> <%p.projectPath%>/<%c.nodeFileName%>

export serverPath=<%p.projectPath%>
export serverPathFile=<%p.projectPath%>/<%c.nodeFileName%>

echo var:serverPathFile:$serverPathFile
echo var:nodeFileName:<%c.nodeFileName%>

chmod 660 $serverPathFile

cd $serverPath
#npm install express --save
<%s.npmInstall%> express 
<%s.npmInstall%> ejs 

rm -f <%p.projectPath%>/404.html
saveTemplate:2:<%p.projectPath%>/404.html

echo 'var:add_inits:<add_inits>'
echo 'var:add_functions:<add_functions>'

a065775b-2b93-4f26-a4bc-4ba6a0fd637f.name: http (8080)
a065775b-2b93-4f26-a4bc-4ba6a0fd637f.description: loads node script with http functions
a065775b-2b93-4f26-a4bc-4ba6a0fd637f.script:
export serverPathFile="<%p.serverPathFile%>"
export toReplace="//<add_Requires>"
export newline="var http = require('http');\n//<add_Requires>"

<%s.Replace file str with str%> "$toReplace" "$newline" "$serverPathFile" 

rm -f tmp.txt
saveTemplate:tmp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> tmp.txt
export toReplace='<add_listen>'

<%s.Replace file line with file%> $toReplace tmp.txt "$serverPathFile"
rm -f tmp.txt

export toReplace="portxxxx"
export newline="<%c.port%>"
<%s.Replace file str with str%> "$toReplace" "$newline" "$serverPathFile"

072fe9f6-b0d6-4ada-ad13-16f458cb06eb.name: https (8445)
072fe9f6-b0d6-4ada-ad13-16f458cb06eb.description:
https://matoski.com/article/node-express-generate-ssl/
 sudo yum install –y https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-7.noarch.rpm
sudo yum install -y pwgen
pwgen 50 1 -s > passphrase

openssl req -new -newkey rsa:4096 -days 365 -nodes -x509 -subj "/C=US/ST=Denial/L=Springfield/O=Dis/CN=www.example.com" -keyout server.key -out server.crt
072fe9f6-b0d6-4ada-ad13-16f458cb06eb.script:
export serverPathFile="<%p.serverPathFile%>"
export toReplace="//<add_Requires>"
export newline="var https = require('https');\n//<add_Requires>"

<%s.Replace file str with str%> "$toReplace" "$newline" "$serverPathFile" 

mkdir <%a.projectPath%>/ssl
cd <%a.projectPath%>/ssl
pwd
openssl req -new -newkey rsa:4096 -days 365 -nodes -x509 -subj "<%c.subject%>" -keyout server.key -out server.crt

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert new https port
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%port%' <%c.port%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#add currentHtmlInsert point to end of template

#insert updated template into server file
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<add_listen>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.serverPathFile%> 
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

cd9c7c16-f17e-449c-b517-09f91963a779.name: sudo re/start Server.js
cd9c7c16-f17e-449c-b517-09f91963a779.description:
Installs and calls sudo forever start to start node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u SysStackUser -e
@reboot /home/SysStackUser/projects/proto/restartServer.sh
cd9c7c16-f17e-449c-b517-09f91963a779.script:
cd <%s.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%c.serverFileName%> <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%s.projectPath%> <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
rm -f nohup.out
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

fbc39bd0-23f4-4b54-9c3b-b17f3a11340a.name: SimpleHTMLTemplate
fbc39bd0-23f4-4b54-9c3b-b17f3a11340a.script:
##Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%p.viewName%>  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

#create blank custom css file
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

#create blank custom js file
export jsPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js
rm -f $jsPath
touch $jsPath
echo '<!-- %customJSInsert% -->' >> $jsPath

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%

snap:<%a.testingHostPort%><%a.serviceRoute%>

bbf77fb3-ff28-4ba5-a401-7feb98a5cafb.name: FAQ Data Store Get - /faqGet
bbf77fb3-ff28-4ba5-a401-7feb98a5cafb.description:
Provides a simple service to get jason data from a data store.
Returns a row or all rows. 
Call service with 'id=#' to get all rows. Call with 'id=[id]' to get a specific row.
Eg: 
http://myNode/ezGet&id=#
   This will return all rows
http://myNode/ezGet&id=123
  This will return only row where id=123
bbf77fb3-ff28-4ba5-a401-7feb98a5cafb.script:
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert jsonVar
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%jsonVar%' <%p.dataStoreVar%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert service End Point name
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serviceEndPointName%' <%c.serviceEndPointName%>  <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
echo var:ezDataGetServiceEndPointName:<%c.serviceEndPointName%>

#add currentHtmlInsert point to end of template
echo -e '\n<!-- <%a.insertServices%>  -->' >> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt 

#insert updated template into server file
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<%a.insertServices%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.serverPathFile%> 

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

d248eefe-fd4e-4d16-9fd4-d2dbafe9bf25.name: SimpleHTMLTemplate
d248eefe-fd4e-4d16-9fd4-d2dbafe9bf25.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%p.viewName%>  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

#create blank custom css file
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%

#snap:<%a.testingHostPort%><%a.serviceRoute%>

320eae85-0ae6-4cd4-899a-67b8ae5893a0.name: re/start node
320eae85-0ae6-4cd4-899a-67b8ae5893a0.description:
Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh
320eae85-0ae6-4cd4-899a-67b8ae5893a0.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

html template with jQuery, BS, etc

b394818d-f3cb-47c4-aacc-e594b64af077.script:
##Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%p.viewName%>  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

#create blank custom css file
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

#create blank custom js file
export jsPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js
rm -f $jsPath
touch $jsPath
echo '<!-- %customJSInsert% -->' >> $jsPath

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%
echo var:customJSInsert:%customJSInsert%

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:insertSrcLink:%insertSrcLink%

echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%

Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh

nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

ffc3d99e-2dd1-48e9-b8fe-aaa436bdb674.template:
• Components
  • FAQ
  • Contact

Programmatically build web servers

Introducing /builder: A general purpose, personal, server configuration manager built with Node.js. Allows you to easily build and deploy web services and applications (webpage/etc) on any Linux cloud or private server. /builder is currently in development phase.



/builder is open source and is available on Github. https://github.com/sbgh/builder

Full software stack management

/builder allows you to be creative by stacking components. A component is a modular container of code, images, build/test scripts and other assets. /builder links the components together and deploys onto your server automatically.

Each component has the information to build its self.
One possible stack configuration


Drag and drop functionality on to your server to expand its capabilities.


Drill down to individual design components.


Add new abilities to your server by dropping them in

Drag and drop components into a new context. Edit the component variables then click build. Headless Chrome is used to display the web app being rebuilt.

Create a new phone input in the /contact app from a copy of email input then rebuild ui.

Modal title

Far far away...

f34266d8-29ab-4e94-99f6-e00589eb3f27.name: sudo re/start Server.js
f34266d8-29ab-4e94-99f6-e00589eb3f27.description:
Installs and calls sudo forever start to start node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u SysStackUser -e
@reboot /home/SysStackUser/projects/proto/restartServer.sh
f34266d8-29ab-4e94-99f6-e00589eb3f27.script:
cd <%s.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%c.serverFileName%> <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%s.projectPath%> <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
rm -f nohup.out
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

d71e0492-c0d2-4d6f-af72-20a696bc4459.name: FM Data Store Get (/fmGet)
d71e0492-c0d2-4d6f-af72-20a696bc4459.description:
Provides a simple service to get jason data from a data store.
Returns a row or all rows. 
Call service with 'id=#' to get all rows. Call with 'id=[id]' to get a specific row.
Eg: 
http://myNode/ezGet&id=#
   This will return all rows
http://myNode/ezGet&id=123
  This will return only row where id=123
d71e0492-c0d2-4d6f-af72-20a696bc4459.script:
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

echo var:ezDataGetServiceEndPointName:<%c.serviceEndPointName%>

#add currentHtmlInsert point to end of template

#insert updated template into server file
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<%a.insertServices%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.serverPathFile%> 

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#Save button tag
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert new id
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%newID%' <%c.id%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert new class
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%newClass%' '<%c.class%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert new fa icon
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%newIcon%' <%c.icon%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert new label
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%label%' '<%c.label%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert new label
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%style%' '<%c.style%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#add currentHtmlInsert point to end of template
echo -e '\n<!-- <%p.currentHtmlInsert%> -->' >> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt 

#insert updated template into currentHtmlInsert
<%s.Replace file line with file%> <%p.currentHtmlInsert%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.servicePathFileName%>

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt


#insert btn code into doc.ready event
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
saveTemplate:2:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%btnId%' <%c.id%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
echo -e '\n<!-- <%a.insertDocReadyJS%> -->' >> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt 
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<%a.insertDocReadyJS%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.servicePathFileName%>

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

echo var:currentInsertJs:%insertEditBtnJs%

af060ceb-1591-424d-99f3-8cffc58fea1c.name: re/start node
af060ceb-1591-424d-99f3-8cffc58fea1c.description:
Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh
af060ceb-1591-424d-99f3-8cffc58fea1c.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &
